name: Jamzz
description:
Jamzz is a relaxing jazz game.

 Where you unbody a maestro in front of musicians and your goal is to make them play in rythm, they tend to desynchronize.

Features :

  • Intuitive inputs
  • Relaxing game

This game was made during 2 days by 6 students from e-artsup Paris and Lyon, during a GameJam.

The goal was to make a game with the theme of the alliance.

TEAM NAME : OnEstLà!

GAME ARTISTS :

Kevin NGUYEN (3D assets ,UI)

Logan Cohen (Sprite 2D)

CREATIVE CODING/GAME DESIGN :

Jules EPITALBRA (Programming)

Sébastien CHEVALLIER (Programming)

Louis BICH (Programming)

Sasha GONCALVES (FX, Assets integration)

Ewen LE MOAL (Sound Design)
